message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you say?
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. Your turn to negotiate!
That's a pretty lopsided split, Bob. I'm not willing to give up 70% of the pot. I'll propose a counteroffer: 420000 for me and 580000 for you.
My previous offer still stands. Will you accept a 58-42 split?
